# a native or resident of any of several places called [[Chalon]] or [[Chalonnes]] in France
types.html:
Chalonnais m (plural Chalonnais, feminine Chalonnaise)

  1. a native or resident of any of several places called Chalon or Chalonnes in France
trans: a native or resident of any of several places called Chalon or Chalonnes in France
